name: Claude Cowork
description: Anthropic's agentic desktop AI with workspace memory that brings Claude Code's capabilities to non-technical users. Features persistent memory across projects, file system access to read/edit/organize files, multi-document editing, browser automation, and task queues. Transforms Claude from a chatbot into a project manager. Available exclusively for Claude Max subscribers on macOS.
community_quotes: Claude Code without the code - for productivity tasks
Transforms AI from chatbot to project manager
Most significant AI productivity tool of 2026
Mostly built by AI using Claude itself

name: OpenCode
description: An open-source AI coding agent that provides Claude Code-level capabilities without vendor lock-in. Works in terminal, IDE, or desktop environments. Overtook Claude Code in GitHub stars on January 6, 2026. Has over 70,000 GitHub stars, 500+ contributors, and 650,000+ monthly active developers. Built with TypeScript.
community_quotes: Overtook Claude Code in GitHub stars
Claude Code-level capabilities without vendor lock-in
Works in terminal, IDE, or desktop environments
One of the most popular open-source coding agents in the world

name: IQuest
description: China's first coding AI release of 2026, fully open source and self-hostable. An AI coding agent that can be run locally by developers. Released January 2, 2026.
community_quotes: Fully open source and can be self-hosted
